name: Pathfinder Corvette
description: This is the only ship that you can obtain that cannot be built in game, it is so bad that it is so good and it is the first ship you obtain through your Vega journey.
obtaining: Cannot be made at all, and is the first ship you obtain in game
tips-builds: Just yeet weapons on there along with some armor not much you can do with this hull
author: Ghostjammer128
